basic_info.description: I am Brady Camp. I am a Software Developer proficient in React and Full-Stack JavaScript. Before pursuing software development I was a branch manager of a rental car company in Seattle. I decided to enter into software development because I have a strong desire to create web applications and solve dynamic problems utilizing programming. My ideal environment to showcase my programming and debugging skills would include working individually or in a team based setting. I have 4 years of previous experience in managing a team and being faced with problems and tasks to ensure customers receive quality products.

projects.title: Animal Racer
projects.description: This was a group project that was completed with vanilla HTML, CSS, and Javascript. This application takes in user input and also displays a responive race track with different character to chose from. As the user you navigate through trivial questions and race against our JavaScript bot!

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: This is a mock website for Pat's Salmon Cookies. The website offers contact and location info for all of Pat's stores as well as a little bit about Pat and some of the merch being sold. It also includes a web page with Pat's sales data and offers the user the ability to generate their own store.

projects.title: BusMall
projects.description: This project is about creating a web page to showcase different products and have the user select the product they like from an assortemnt of 3 images. This would go for 25 rounds and display the results for the amount of selections and views each product received. This was to find out which product should be featured in the BusMall catalog.
